titles.title: Liberian Refugee Immigration Protection Act of 2009
To adjust the immigration status of certain Liberian nationals who were provided refuge in the United States.
Liberian Refugee Immigration Protection Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

bill.summary: Liberian Refugee Immigration Protection Act of 2009 - Provides for the permanent resident status adjustment of certain Liberian nationals who were granted, or are eligible to apply for, temporary protected status on or after March 27, 1991.
